sen.j: 中長者町通（なかちょうじゃまちどり）は京都市上京区の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Nakachojamachi-dori Street is one of the streets running from east to west in Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Nakachojamachi-dori Street is one of the streets running from east to west in Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Nakachojamachi-dori Street is one of the streets running from east to west in Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 上長者町通と下長者町通にはさまれ、延長およそ400m。
sen.e: This Street is located between Kamichojamachi-dori Street and Shimochojamachi-dori Street, and extends approx. 400m.
This street is located between Kamichojamachi-dori Street and Shimochojamachi-dori Street, and extends approx. 400m.
This street is located between Kamichojamachi-dori Street and Shimochojamachi-dori Street, and extends approx. 400m.

sen.j: 京都御苑からやや西に幹線道路を入った、市街地中心部の商店、事務所、住宅の混在する地域である。
sen.e: The area along Nakachojamachi-dori Street which is located off the arterial highway and slightly in the west of the Kyoto Gyoen National Garden is a central part of urban area where stores, offices and housings coexist.

The area along Nakachojamachi-dori Street which is located off the arterial highway and slightly in the west of the Kyoto Gyoen National Garden is a central part of an urban area where stores, offices and housings coexist.
